emails.subject: Urgent: Project Deadline Extended
emails.body:
Hi Team,

Good news! The Q4 project deadline has been extended to December 15th. Please review the updated requirements document and confirm your availability for the sync meeting on Friday at 2 PM.

Best regards,
John

emails.body:
This week's top stories:
- New LLM models break performance records
- Cloud computing trends for 2025

Unsubscribe | View in browser

emails.subject: CLAIM YOUR $1000 PRIZE NOW!!!
emails.body: Congratulations! You've won $1000! Click here immediately to claim your prize. Limited time offer. Act now!!!

emails.subject: Action Required: Code Review by EOD
emails.body:
Hi,

Can you please review the pull request #234 for the authentication module? We need your approval by end of day today to merge it into production tomorrow morning.

PR link: github.com/repo/pr/234

Thanks,
Sarah

emails.subject: Meeting Request: Performance Review
emails.body:
Hello,

I'd like to schedule your quarterly performance review. Are you available next Tuesday, November 28th at 10 AM? Please let me know if this works or suggest alternative times.

Best,
HR Team

emails.subject: Feature Request for Dashboard
emails.body:
Hi,

We love the new dashboard! Could you add export functionality for CSV and PDF formats? This would really help our reporting process. No immediate deadline, but would appreciate it in the next sprint if possible.

Thanks!

emails.subject: [Notification] New issue assigned to you
emails.body:
Issue #456 has been assigned to you: 'Fix login redirect bug'

Priority: High
Milestone: v2.1.0
Due: November 30, 2025

View on GitHub

emails.subject: Sprint Planning Notes
emails.body:
Hi team,

Attached are the sprint planning notes from today's meeting. Key points:
- Focus on bug fixes this sprint
- New feature development postponed
- Daily standups at 9:30 AM

Let me know if you have questions.

emails.subject: Required: Update Your Password
emails.body:
As part of our security policy, all passwords must be updated every 90 days. Your password expires in 3 days. Please update it at your earliest convenience.

Update Password | Security Guidelines

emails.subject: Collaboration Opportunity
emails.body:
Hey,

I've been following your work on the ML integration project. We're working on something similar and would love to explore potential collaboration. Are you free for a call next week?

Cheers,
Dave

emails.subject: Office Closure Notice - Thanksgiving
emails.body:
This is a reminder that our office will be closed on Thursday and Friday, November 23-24, for the Thanksgiving holiday. We will resume normal operations on Monday, November 27.

Happy Thanksgiving!

emails.subject: Expense Report Submission Reminder
emails.body:
Hi,

Your October expense report is still pending. Please submit it by November 27th to ensure timely reimbursement. If you have any questions, contact the accounting team.

Thank you!

emails.subject: User Feedback Summary - Nov 2025
emails.body:
Hi team,

Here's this month's user feedback summary. Top requests:
1. Dark mode for mobile app
2. Faster search functionality
3. Batch operations for data management

Full report attached. Let's discuss in next week's product meeting.
